TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit X509Certificate2 extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate

summary.span: 表示 X.509 证书。

span.span: Represents an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 结构可由国际标准化 (ISO) 组织中的工作组。The X.509 structure originated in the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) working groups. 此结构可以用于表示各种类型的信息包括标识、 授权和持有者属性 （权限、 年龄、 性别、 位置、 隶属关系，等）。This structure can be used to represent various types of information including identity, entitlement, and holder attributes (permissions, age, sex, location, affiliation, and so forth). 虽然 ISO 规范是最有足够的结构本身，类旨在模型由 Internet 工程任务组 (IETF) 公钥基础结构，X.509 （但颁发的规范中定义的使用方案) 工作组。Although the ISO specifications are most informative on the structure itself, the class is designed to model the usage scenarios defined in specifications issued by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) Public Key Infrastructure, X.509 (PKIX) working group. 这些规范最信息性是 RFC 3280"[证书和证书吊销列表 (CRL) 配置文件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。"The most informative of these specifications is RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则此类型实现接口。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及早期版本、类未实现接口，并因此不具有`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象来加密和解密文件。The following example demonstrates how to use an object to encrypt and decrypt a file. [!code-csharp[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/vb/program.vb#1)] 下面的示例创建命令行可执行文件，以作为自变量的证书文件并将输出到控制台的各种证书属性。The following example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个空对象，与其他构造函数的此类使用从字节数组、 指针或证书文件的证书信息不同。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from a byte array, a pointer, or a certificate file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储区，选择仅有效证书，然后允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 该示例然后将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新使用字节数组中的证书信息的对象。This constructor creates a new object using certificate information from a byte array. 字节数组可以是二进制文件 (DER) 编码或 Base64 编码 X.509 数据。The byte array can be binary (DER) encoded or Base64-encoded X.509 data. 字节数组也可以是 PKCS7 （验证码） 签名文件;签名者证书用于创建对象。The byte array can also be a PKCS7 (Authenticode) signed file; the signer certificate is used to create the object. 如果你创建通过指定的 PKCS7 签名的文件存储区的证书`rawData`、为该存储区签名的证书而不是任何证书存储区中创建。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新对象对于 Microsoft 加密 API 证书上下文，使用句柄`PCCERT_CONTEXT`。This constructor creates a new object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`. 请注意，此构造函数的直接调用方需要托管的代码的权限。Note that the immediate caller of this constructor requires unmanaged code permission. > [!IMPORTANT] > 构造函数创建证书上下文的副本。The constructor creates a copy of the certificate context. 不要假定传递给构造函数的上下文结构是有效，则为它可能已被释放。Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released. 你可以获取一份当前`PCCERT_CONTEXT`结构仅在生存期内的属性，但它是有效对象。You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于包含证书的私钥的 PKCS12 (PFX) 文件。This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 调用此构造函数使用正确的密码对私钥进行解密，并将其保存到密钥容器。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a key container. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永远不会硬编码你的源代码中的密码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以从使用集中检索硬编码密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六进制编辑器中，或只需打开 Notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果你创建通过指定的 PKCS7 签名的文件存储区的证书`rawData`、为该存储区签名的证书而不是任何证书存储区中创建。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于包含证书的私钥的 PKCS12 (PFX) 文件。This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 调用此构造函数使用正确的密码对私钥进行解密，并将其保存到 Microsoft 加密 API 加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). > [!IMPORTANT] > 永远不会硬编码你的源代码中的密码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以从使用集中检索硬编码密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六进制编辑器中，或只需打开 Notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果你创建通过指定的 PKCS7 签名的文件存储区的证书`rawData`、为该存储区签名的证书而不是任何证书存储区中创建。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在与存储相关联的证书上设置此属性。This property is set only on a certificate that is associated with a store. 如果将属性设置和证书添加到证书存储，则保留该值。If the property is set and the certificate is added to a certificate store, the value is persisted. 如果从存储中检索的证书设置的属性，则立即保留该值。If the property is set on a certificate retrieved from a store, the value is persisted immediately. X.509 存储中, 已存档的证书不包括在返回对象除非属性设置为`true`。In an X.509 store, archived certificates are not included in the returned object unless the property is set to `true`. 没有物理存档活动发生时设置或取消设置值。No physical archival activity occurs when the value is set or unset. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储区，选择仅有效证书，然后允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 该示例然后将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 v3 证书格式中定义的扩展允许要包括在证书的其他数据。The extensions defined in the X.509 v3 certificate format allow additional data to be included in the certificate. X.509 v3 定义中以及在 RFC 3280，但由 ISO 定义大量的扩展"[证书和证书吊销列表 (CRL) 配置文件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。"A number of extensions are defined by ISO in the X.509 v3 definition as well as by PKIX in RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." 常用的扩展包括有关密钥用法的信息 ()，密钥标识符 ()，证书策略、 吊销信息 （CRL 分发点扩展） 和其他用途。Common extensions include information regarding key usage (), key identifiers (), certificate policies, revocation information (CRL Distribution Point extension), and other uses. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储区，选择仅有效证书，然后允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 该示例然后将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 友好名称是可以设置的 X.509 证书存储中的属性。Friendly names are properties in the X.509 certificate store that can be set. 它们用于使用户能够将别名与证书关联，以便他们能够轻松识别。They are used to enable a user to associate aliases with certificates so they can be easily identified. 如果没有友好名称存在证书，一个空字符串 ("") 返回。If no friendly name exists for the certificate, an empty string ("") is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建命令行可执行文件，以作为自变量的证书文件并将输出到控制台的各种证书属性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于获取 X.509 证书的原始字节数组，并填充并用其关联值的对象。This method can be used to take a raw byte array of an X.509 certificate and populate the object with its associated values. 因为此方法接受字节数组，它可仅为不需要密码，包括一个 Base64 编码或 DER 编码的 X.509 证书或 PFX/PKCS12 证书的证书类型。Since this method accepts only a byte array, it can be used only for certificate types that do not require a password, including a Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificate or a PFX/PKCS12 certificate. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 证书可以包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在这种情况下，使用与私钥关联的第一个证书，或如果找到没有私钥，则使用第一个证书。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

summary.span: 使用证书文件中的信息填充 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用的证书文件，如文件扩展名为.cer，用于表示 X.509 证书并填充使用该文件包含证书的对象。This method uses a certificate file, such as a file with a .cer extension, that represents an X.509 certificate and populates the object with the certificate the file contains. 此方法可以用于多个证书类型，包括 Base64 编码或 DER 编码的 X.509 证书、 PFX/PKCS12 证书和签名者的证书，如验证码。This method can be used with several certificate types, including Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, PFX/PKCS12 certificates, and signer certificates such as Authenticode. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 证书可以包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在这种情况下，使用与私钥关联的第一个证书，或如果找到没有私钥，则使用第一个证书。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以为如 Base64 编码或 DER 编码的 X.509 证书或 PFX/PKCS12 证书的证书类型使用此方法。You can use this method for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, or PFX/PKCS12 certificates. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 证书可以包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在这种情况下，使用与私钥关联的第一个证书，或如果找到没有私钥，则使用第一个证书。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永远不会硬编码你的源代码中的密码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以从使用集中检索硬编码密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六进制编辑器中，或只需打开 Notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于填充对象使用的字节数组所表示的证书的密码。This method can be used to populate an object using a password for the certificate represented by the byte array. 值可以用于控制在何处以及如何导入私有密钥。The value can be used to control where and how to import the private key. 此方法接受字节数组，可用于证书类型，如 Base64 编码或 DER 编码的 X.509 证书或 PFX/PKCS12 证书。This method accepts a byte array and can be used for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates or PFX/PKCS12 certificates. 请注意，PFX/PKCS12 证书可以包含多个证书。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在这种情况下，使用与私钥关联的第一个证书，或如果找到没有私钥，则使用第一个证书。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永远不会硬编码你的源代码中的密码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以从使用集中检索硬编码密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六进制编辑器中，或只需打开 Notepad.exe 等文本编辑器中的程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建命令行可执行文件，以作为自变量的证书文件并将输出到控制台的各种证书属性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前此属性只支持 RSA 或 DSA 密钥，因此它返回或对象。Currently this property supports only RSA or DSA keys, so it returns either an or a object. 如果没有私钥是与证书相关联，它将返回`null`。If no private key is associated with the certificate, it returns `null`. > [!WARNING] > 如果将此属性设置为`null`或另一个注册表项而无需首先删除它，磁盘上剩余的私钥文件。If you set this property to `null` or to another key without first deleting it, a private key file is left on the disk. 若要正确删除与此属性关联的私钥，设置`PersistKeyInCsp`到`false`，然后调用方法。To properly delete the private key associated with this property, set `PersistKeyInCsp` to `false`, and then call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储区，选择仅有效证书，然后允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 该示例然后将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. summary.span: 获取证书的序列号。

span.span: Gets the serial number of a certificate.
The serial number of the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 证书的序列号是原始的 X.509 协议的一部分。The serial number of the certificate is part of the original X.509 protocol. 序列号是唯一的编号由证书颁发者颁发，这也称为证书颁发机构 (CA)。The serial number is a unique number issued by the certificate issuer, which is also called the Certificate Authority (CA). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建命令行可执行文件，以作为自变量的证书文件并将输出到控制台的各种证书属性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象标识符 () 标识用的证书的签名算法的类型。The object identifier () identifies the type of signature algorithm used by the certificate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储区，选择仅有效证书，然后允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 该示例然后将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console. summary.span: 获取证书的主题可分辨名称。

span.span: Gets the subject distinguished name from a certificate.

value.span: 一个 对象，用于表示证书主题的名称。

span.span: An object that represents the name of the certificate subject.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可分辨的名称是证书用户的名称。The subject distinguished name is the name of the user of the certificate. 文本表示形式的使用者或颁发者的证书，证书的可分辨的名称。The distinguished name for the certificate is a textual representation of the subject or issuer of the certificate. 此表示形式的名称属性，例如，包含"CN = MyName，OU = MyOrgUnit，C = US"。This representation consists of name attributes, for example, "CN=MyName, OU=MyOrgUnit, C=US". ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建命令行可执行文件，以作为自变量的证书文件并将输出到控制台的各种证书属性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. summary.span: 获取证书的指纹。

span.span: Gets the thumbprint of a certificate.
The thumbprint of the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指纹动态生成使用 SHA1 算法和证书中以物理方式不存在。The thumbprint is dynamically generated using the SHA1 algorithm and does not physically exist in the certificate. 指纹是证书的唯一值，因为它通常用于在证书存储中查找特定证书。Since the thumbprint is a unique value for the certificate, it is commonly used to find a particular certificate in a certificate store. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建命令行可执行文件，以作为自变量的证书文件并将输出到控制台的各种证书属性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. summary.span: 以文本格式显示 X.509 证书。

span.span: Displays an X.509 certificate in text format.
The certificate information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正如所有`ToString`方法，输出可能不是一致各个版本.NET Framework 中，因此不应针对内容分析方法结果。As with all `ToString` methods, the output might not be consistent across versions of the .NET Framework, so the method results should not be parsed for content. 使用上的属性对象以获取精确的信息。Use the properties on the object to obtain precise information. 此方法以文本格式显示的证书。This method displays the certificate in text format. 如果`verbose`参数设置为`true`，文本显示内容包括公钥、 私钥和扩展。If the `verbose` parameter is set to `true`, the text display includes the public key, private key, and extensions. 如果`verbose`设置为`false`，文本显示内容包括可从 X.509 证书，包括指纹、 序列号、 使用者和颁发者名称和有效日期信息获取这些字段。If `verbose` is set to `false`, the text display includes those fields available from the X.509 certificate, including thumbprint, serial number, subject and issuer names, and validity date information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建采用作为自变量的证书文件，并输出到控制台的各种证书属性命令行可执行文件。The following code example creates a command line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. summary.span: 使用基本验证策略执行 X.509 链验证。

span.span: Performs a X.509 chain validation using basic validation policy.

returns.span: 如果验证成功，则为 ；如果验证失败，则为 。

span.span: if the validation succeeds; if the validation fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法生成一个简单的证书链，并将基本的策略应用到该链。This method builds a simple chain for the certificate and applies the base policy to that chain. 如果你需要有关失败的详细信息，验证直接使用的证书对象。If you need more information about a failure, validate the certificate directly using the object. 请注意，可以使用替代默认链接引擎类。Note that the default chaining engine can be overridden using the class. 在 Microsoft Windows Server 2003 上的默认引擎符合 RFC3280，所述的规范"[证书和证书吊销列表 (CRL) 配置文件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。"On Microsoft Windows Server 2003, the default engine conforms to the specification described in RFC3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户证书存储区，选择仅有效证书，然后允许用户选择一个或多个证书。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 该示例然后将证书信息写入控制台。The example then writes certificate information to the console.
